thread.title: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent provides TIM with record distance microwave link
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent provides TIM with record distance microwave link | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Alcatel-Lucent provides TIM with record distance microwave link
text:
Sept 22 Alcatel Lucent SA :
* Provides TIM with record distance microwave link that will ensure continuous ultra-broadband connectivity between the Sicilian islands of Pantelleria and Lampedusa Source text: bit.ly/1KxznqM Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
